channel.title: [BUG] Glitchy Collision on vent props in bm_c2a2c
channel.description:
Let me preface this by saying that I've been playing about with Hammer on bm_c2a2a - as a result, it doesn't link to c2a2b at the moment, so I have to use the map command directly to load anything else in OaR. I don't know if that would affect the issue or not, but I haven't modified c2a2b or c2a2c yet. Anyways.
In the missile launch area, on the right side when entering through the fence, there are two vents next to each other. [img='https://i.imgur.com/25D0hQL.jpg',none,660][/img]
The vent grills have some... interesting collision detection.
By just pushing against them and jumping, it's possible to get stuck inside the vent's hitbox: [img='https://i.imgur.com/uKRbbzS.jpg',none,654][/img]
And jumping on top of the grill will treat the player as if they're falling - once they move far enough away from the grill, they'll plummet to the ground and take fall damage depending on how long they were floating.
I haven't been able to recreate it so far, but I also managed to turn [i]myself[/i] into a rocket by getting stuck on the vent and using explosives to kill myself: [img='https://i.imgur.com/ZFLmsNQ.jpg',none,653][/img]
Video of the fall damage bug [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dPqziRUjskE']here[/url].
